title: Pinot Noir
description: Lorraine Evanoffâ€™s Pinot Noir marks the return of Louise Moscow ten years after working with the FBI and CIA to take down the corrupt Bank of Credit and Commerce International. This time, in the aftermath of the catastrophic events of September 11, 2001, the FBI summons Louise out of witness protection to investigate another international banking scandal: the unsolved murder of multi-billionaire banker and philanthropist, Ekram M. Almasi.
author: Lorraine Evanoff
